markdown.markdown: ```{r echo=FALSE} lesson_links <- function(daynum) { glue::glue("[Reading](Textbook/Reading-notes-lesson-{daynum}.html) : [Student notes](Student-notes/Student-notes-lesson-{daynum}.html)") } ``` Math 300Z is a proposed revision to Math 300 that will be taught for the first time in Spring 2023. The revisions apply only to Lessons 19 and up; the first 18 lessons will come from Math 300. Both Math 300 and Math 300Z will start with Chapters 1 through 6 of [*Statistical Inference via Data Science*](https://moderndive.com/1-getting-started.html). For the second half of the semester, Math 300Z continues with [*Lessons in Statistical Thinking*](Textbook/index.html).
